au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends Activity
    The main app controller, control's program flow a life cycle

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameView mCurrent
      The current GameView, this is kept so that it can be cleaned up properly before moving onto the next view
      private static String mName
      Class name used for logging
      private String[] mScoreDates
      Ordered list of dates, each date corresponds to a score in mScores
      private int[] mScores
      Ordered list of scores, each score has an associated date in mScoreDates

        Getter for the Score Dates.
        Returns:
        The array of Score Dates

      • getScores

        public int[] getScores()
        Getter for the Scores.
        Returns:
        The array of Scores

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Method called after activity creation. Loads score data from file and then starts the menu view.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - A record of saved data for this instance of the activity

      • onPause

        protected void onPause()
        Method called when activity is paused. we don't want to support pausing, so we save our data and kill the app.

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Method called when activity destroyed. We use this chance to save our data for the next time the app is opened.

      • changeView

        public void changeView(GameView view)
        Sets the current view to the one provided to the method. Cleans up the old view and.
        Parameters:
        view - The new GameView to run

      • loadData

        private void loadData()
        Loads score data from file. If loading fails, the score arrays are filled with default values.

      • saveData

        private void saveData()
        Saves the current score data to file
